attributes.action: Provide equal occupational pensions for men and women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Women currently receive higher lump sum payments from thier pension funds I now request that this discrimination be stopped and equal payments made. a female police officer recieves on average 12,000 pounds more than a male despite contributing less.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Provide equal occupational pensions for men and women."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11983.asp

Prime Minister's Office
